snippet: Delegates in a world wildlife convention united to protect five shark species from powerful commercial interests.
abstract: Editorial welcomes decision by delegates at Convention on International Trade in Endangered Species of Wild Fauna and Flora to impose strict rules to keep five species of sharks and two types of manta rays from being fished to extinction.
lead_paragraph: Delegates in a world wildlife convention united to protect five shark species from powerful commercial interests.

headline.seo: Good News on the Shark Front
headline.main: Good News on the Shark Front
headline.print_headline: Good News on the Shark Front
